channel.title: halts on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in halts on PepsFeeder

item.title: Indonesia halts Islamic assembly, quarantining 9,000 people
item.description: MAKASSAR, Indonesia (AP) — Indonesia halted a mass congregation of nearly 9,000 Muslim pilgrims and began quarantining and checking their health Thursday to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus.

item.title: Vatican halts Mexico abuse prevention mission, cites virus
item.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Mexico’s bishops said Friday the Vatican had suspended a clerical sex abuse fact-finding and assistance mission to Mexico due to the spreading coronavirus in Italy and now the Vatican.

item.title: Virus halts pilgrimages to Mecca, Friday prayers in Iran
item.description: TEHRAN, Iran (AP) — The coronavirus outbreak disrupted Islamic treasure in the Middle East as Saudi Arabia on Wednesday banned its voters and other residents of the kingdom from performing the pilgrimage in Mecca, whereas Iran canceled Friday prayers in principal cities.
